title: status
description: Indicates if an event or place is still happening or not.

type.description:
One of three possible status types.

Event:
- `available`: The event is happening as planned
- `temporarilyUnavailable`: The event will be postponed
- `unavailable`: The event is permanently cancelled

Place:
- `available`: The place is open (during its openingHours if applicable)
- `temporarilyUnavailable`: The place is temporarily closed
- `unavailable`: The place is permanently closed
